title: Justin Bieber holds hands with stylish wife Hailey
text:
Justin and Hailey Bieber couldn't resist stepping out to celebrate their friend's birthday.

The newlyweds stepped out on Saturday evening along with some other big name stars as they stepped out to attend their friend and fellow musician Andrew Watt's birthday party.

Justin, 25, and Hailey, 22, kept it casual as they had their arms wrapped around one another and held hands as they headed inside the Beverly Hills mansion.

It's party time! Justin and Hailey Bieber stepped out on Saturday evening along with some other big name stars as they stepped out to attend their friend and fellow musician Andrew Watt's birthday party

The two lovebirds looked casual for their outing as the Love Yourself singer wore a burgundy-colored v-neck and maroon pants.

He kept up with the red theme and wore a bright red cap that he wore backwards and a pair of white shoes as he held hands with his Mrs.

As they were heading inside, he had his arms around Hailey and another friend as Bieber walked in between the two.

The couple lives close to where the party was being held and walked the few short blocks to the party instead of catching a ride.

Let's do this! As they were heading inside, he had his arms around Hailey and another friend as Bieber walked in between the two

Skipping the Uber: The couple lives close to where the party was being held and walked the few short blocks to the party instead of catching a ride

The supermodel stayed on trend with a white tank top tucked into a pair of cut off high waisted denim shorts.

She wore an oversized long sleeve denim shirt that she had draped at her arms as she held hands with her husband.

Hailey pulled the entire look together with a pair of thigh-high black shiny boots.

Performer: Adam Levine and his wife Behati Prinsloo are spotted walking back home after the party in which Adam was one of the performers

It seems as through Andrew as a lot of famous friends that stepped out to wish him a happy birthday.

He even had Maroon 5 frontrunner Adam Levine and his wife Behati Prinsloo in attendance as Adam was one of the performers of the evening.

Also in attendance Andrew hosted, Camila Cabello, Jared Leto, Kaia Gerber, Scooter Braun, and Lori Loughlin's daughter Olivia Jade and her boyfriend Jackson Guthy.

Having fun! Camila Cabello poses as she is seen heading to the party after her performance at We Can Survive at the Hollywood Bowl

Edgy style: Kaia Gerber was spotted calling her Uber while leaving the party looking stylish in denim jeans a black leather jacket

Stepping out: Olivia Jade steps out with her boyfriend Jackson Guthy for the party. This is one of the first appearances Olivia has made since her mother Lori Loughlin and father Mossimo Giannulli were involved in the college scandal that bribed her way into college

Party attire: Jared Leto wears an eccentric outfit as he is spotted leaving the Andrew's birthday party
description: The newlyweds stepped out on Saturday evening along with some other big name stars as they stepped out to attend their friend and fellow musician Andrew Watt's birthday party.
